bug.author: Oscilloputer0627
bug.summary: the package for UI , called node-10.11.0-linux-x64.tar.gz can't be extracted
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: newest version Describe the bug one the instrall process pops out a info "[INFO] Alluxio UI 2.0.0-SNAPSHOT .......................... FAILURE [ 1.423 s]" and the [ERROR] message are as below: [ERROR] Failed to execute goal com.github.eirslett:frontend-maven-plugin:1.6:install-node-and-npm (install node and npm) on project alluxio-webui: Could not extract the Node archive: Could not extract archive: '/home/orkesh_nurbolat/.m2/repository/com/github/eirslett/node/10.11.0/node-10.11.0-linux-x64.tar.gz': EOFException -> [Help 1] [ERROR] [ERROR] To see the full stack trace of the errors, re-run Maven with the -e switch. [ERROR] Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging. [ERROR] [ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please read the following articles: [ERROR] [Help 1] <denchmark-link:http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/MojoFailureException>http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/MojoFailureException</denchmark-link>
[ERROR] [ERROR] After correcting the problems, you can resume the build with the command [ERROR] mvn -rf :alluxio-webui To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior (as minimally and precisely as possible) Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. Urgency Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Oscilloputer0627>@Oscilloputer0627</denchmark-link> Looks like the file is not downloaded correctly. Can you try deleting it and rerun the maven command?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Oscilloputer0627>@Oscilloputer0627</denchmark-link> - please reopen if the issue is still there.
